# Autolykos

*(Back to: [Protocol Overview](protocol-overview.md))*

Ergo [mining](mining-overview.md) is based on **[Autolykos](autolykos.md)**, a fairly launched efficient [ASIC-resistant](asic.md) Proof of Work algorithm. ::cards::
